Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:06 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:06 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:06 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
